North Karnataka road trip, Jan 2023

Author

Karthik Thrikkadeeri, Praveen Bennur, Sahana M

Published

January 4, 2023

Here’s our trip report.

Route plans

  • Day 1
  • Day 2
  • Day 3
  • Day 4
  • Day 5
  • Day 6 (Benakkatti to Bengaluru)

Itinerary

Day 1 (2023-01-04), ~400km

  1. 03:30—Start from CBL, Bangalore
  2. 06:00–08:00—Sri Seebi Narasimhaswami Temple (scrub forest past Tumkur) OR Devarayana Durga
  3. 09:30–10:30—Aimangala Lake, before Chitradurga
  4. 11:00–12:30—Jogimatti Forest, Chitradurga (eBird)
  5. 12:30–13:00—Lunch (check for WNT en route Kotturu, Jagaluru is Davanagere district)
  6. 15:00–15:45—Kotturu Kere, Kotturu (eBird)
  7. 17:00–19:00—Ankasamudra Bird Sanctuary (eBird)
  8. 20:00—Reach Hosapete

Day 2 (2023-01-05), ~270km

  1. 05:00—Start from Hosapete
  2. 06:00–08:00—Hampi (perhaps Matanga Hill)
  3. 09:30–11:30—Tungabhadra Backwaters, Nakaralu Tanda (eBird) (Hagaribommanahalli?)
  4. 14:00–15:30—Kinal Dam, past Koppal
  5. 17:00–18:30—Nidasheshi Lake, Kushtagi (eBird)
  6. 21:00—Reach Praveen’s home in Benakatti

Day 3 (2023-01-06), ~350km

  1. 04:00–06:00—Start from Benakatti to Bijapur
  2. 06:00–07:00—Random spots, Bijapur (Bijapuri Mosque?)
  3. 07:30–09:00—Bhutnal Kere (eBird) (Demoiselle might be around!)
  4. 09:30–11:00—Deserted Monuments (eBird)
  5. 12:00–13:00—Sankh lake, MH
  6. 13:30–14:30—Bhivargi lake, MH
  7. 14:30–15:15—Lunch
  8. 16:30–18:00—Savalsang grasslands (eBird)
  9. 21:00—Reach Benakatti

Day 4 (2023-01-07), ~150km

With Praveen Baddi 1. Bagalkot 2. Herkal Lake backwaters (eBird) 3. Chinkara Wildlife Sanctuary (make multiple point-based hotspots)

Day 5 (2023-01-08), ~280km

  1. 03:30—Start from Benakatti
  2. 06:30–09:00—Naviluteertha Dam (Malaprabha River/Renukasagar Reservoir) (eBird)
  3. 11:30–13:00—Badami (Agastya Kere and Caves)
  4. 13:00–13:30—Lunch
  5. 14:00–15:00—Pattadakkal
  6. 15:30–16:30—Aihole (no hotspots yet)
  7. 17:00–19:00—Kotikall (wetland and dry area, no hotspots; also two lakes near Guledagudda)
  8. 20:00—Reach Benakatti

Day 6 (2023-01-09), ~470km

  1. 04:00—Start from Bagalkot
  2. 14:00—Reach Bangalore

Species needing attention

  • White-naped Tit: possible from Chitradurga to Hospet
  • Demoiselle Crane: possible really anywhere north of Kotturu exactly at this time, but let’s hope the strange weather this winter hasn’t been a problem for this.
  • Gulls (e.g., Black- vs Brown-headed)
  • Tern (Black-bellied!)
  • Harriers
  • Shrikes
  • Prinias
  • Larks
  • Wagtail
  • Wheatears

Fuel estimates

(overestimation but w/o tolls)

~1900kms = 130L = Rs. 13,000 ~ Rs. 4,400 per person

Actual expense:

  • 1759 km = 118 L = Rs. 12,095 = Rs. 4,032 per person
  • Tolls: Rs. 1365 = Rs. 455 per person
  • Puncture repair: Rs. 500 = Rs. 166 per person
